SEARCH
Package com.conductor.core.model

Interface Option

All Known Subinterfaces:
Privilege
All Known Implementing Classes:
AccessLevel, ApplicationStatus, EventAccessStrategy, EventFormat, EventOption, EventPrivilege, EventStatus, OrganizationPrivilege, ResourceType, UserRole
public interface Option
A contract for all constants defined as Enum for type safety in the data model. Static methods defined in this contract: fromName and getAllOptions; allows for better interaction with the data model with services.
See Also:
  • ResourceType
  • ApplicationStatus
  • PermissionConverter

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Returns:
      the display name for this option

    • fromName

      static <E extends Enum<E> & Option> Optional<E> fromName(Class<E> enumClass, String name)
      Looks up an Option by its display name using case-insensitive matching.
      Type Parameters:
      E - the enum type that implements Option
      Parameters:
      enumClass - the Class object representing the enum type
      name - the display name to search for (case-insensitive, may be null)
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the matching enum constant, or empty if no match found
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if enumClass is null

    • getAllOptions

      static <E extends Enum<E> & Option> String getAllOptions(Class<E> enumClass)
      Type Parameters:
      E - the enum type that implements Option
      Parameters:
      enumClass - the Class object representing the enum type
      Returns:
      a comma-separated string of all options
